hadiths.text: It was narrated that Hakim bin Hizam said:"I asked the Messenger of Allah and he gave me, then I asked him and he gave me, then I asked him and he gave me. Then he said: 'O Kahim! This wealth is attractive and sweet. Whoever takes it without being greedy, it will be blessed for him, and whoever takes it with avarice, it will not be blessed for him. He is like one who eats and is not satisfied. And the upper hand is better than the lower hand

chapter.ara-name: باب مَسْأَلَةِ الرَّجُلِ فِي أَمْرٍ لاَ بُدَّ لَهُ مِنْهُ
chapter.eng-name: Asking When There Is No Alternative
